item.title: Reasons to write in English
item.description:
I started this blog a long time ago and of course, I started to write it in my native language. I did not even think I would work with colleagues, not from my country. As I more and more work with international companies I decided to switch my blog to a bilingual model. The plan is simple:

  • New articles would be published in both languages
  • Old articles written in Russian would stay as it is
  • Later I may translate some of them if they are not completely obsolete
  • To keep data accessible I create rewrite rules so Google (hopefully) will not downrate my SERP position

Not sure how it would work but let’s see.
